name: Bounty of the Bard
description:
You’re on the run. A bounty hunter has been hired to track down and kill you. They’ve cornered you into a cave and there’s nothing left to do but fight! 

However, you will not win this battle with weapons but instead with your music! No seriously, you’re a bard that can use their magic to allure the boss instead of damaging them. Transform their projectiles into something more enticing and something that won’t kill you as much. 

Lovingly made by: Greg Peterson and Matthew Hawkins

Credits: Dialogue System created by friendly cosmonaut
